tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He was very very patient with me , explained what he was doing . Have gotten same treatment earlier elsewhere which was very painful but Dr Nisar handled it so well and though there was mild discomfort as expected, he was very polite and friendly throughout. Highly recommended.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
He explained my queries in detail and cleared my concerns.
Moreover his treatment is also.satisfactory,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nisar makes his patients feel comfortable, especially because Root Canal procedures can cause varying levels of stress within people. As always with the RCT procedures that I have had in the past in Dr. Nisar’s care, he explained the procedure, ensured I had minimal to no discomfort and did a thorough job as always. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My visit to the clinic was a pleasant experience with absolutely no wait time. The Doctor has taken a considerable amount of time to provide all the necessary guidance with an appropriate treatment and follow-up. Much appreciated and definitely recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would like to thanks Doctor Pujari and Nissar for RCT, they are very experienced and friendly doctors. I have a Gag reflex, but they treated me with utmost care. Thanks for 32 multi-speciality for having such great doctors
